title: Node State is abnormal
description: A Scylla server "shutting down" typically indicates a planned maintenance, upgrade, or scaling operation. The monitor tracks if your Scylla node change states.

definition.message:
{{server.name}} is shutting down. Current value of {{value}} 

The operation mode of the current nodes can have values of UNKNOWN = 0; STARTING = 1; JOINING = 2; NORMAL = 3; LEAVING = 4; DECOMMISSIONED = 5; DRAINING = 6; DRAINED = 7; MOVING = 8
definition.name: [Scylla] Server is shutting down
